headline: Bristol-Myers Squibb Expands Cancer Efforts With New AI And Drug Deals
summary: Bristol-Myers Squibb (NYSE:BMY) has entered a new collaboration with Microsoft to use AI for earlier lung cancer detection, with a focus on underserved communities. The company also announced a partnership with Janux Therapeutics to co-develop a cancer therapy targeting solid tumors. Both agreements expand BMY’s activity in digital health tools and cancer drug development. Bristol-Myers Squibb is a large biopharmaceutical company with a long focus on oncology, immunology, and cardiovascular...
